name: videodrome
description: Manage your video library - download, identify, organize, and ingest media with Plex, TMDb, and Transmission integration
author: Nick Perrott

tmdb_api_key.description: TMDb API key for media identification

media_root_path.description: Root path for Plex media libraries (e.g., /data/media)

ingest_directory.description: Directory to watch for new media files

auto_ingest.description: Enable automatic processing of high-confidence matches

TORRENT_SEARCH_PROVIDERS.description: Comma-separated torrent search providers (thepiratebay, nyaa, ygg). Default: thepiratebay

YGG_USERNAME.description: YggTorrent username (only needed when ygg is in TORRENT_SEARCH_PROVIDERS)

VIDEODROME_NAS_IP.description: TrueNAS / NAS server IP address (e.g. 10.9.8.15) — used by mount_media_volume()

VIDEODROME_NAS_SHARE.description: SMB share name on the NAS (default: MEDIA)

VIDEODROME_NAS_MOUNT_POINT.description: Local mount point for the NAS share (default: /Volumes/MEDIA)

VIDEODROME_NAS_AUTO_MOUNT.description: Automatically attempt to mount the NAS volume when file access fails

OMDB_API_KEY.description: OMDb API key for IMDb ratings and Rotten Tomatoes scores (free tier: 1000 req/day — get one at https://www.omdbapi.com/). Optional — TMDb ratings are used when absent.
